name: Flipget
description:
Game by Jordan Sendar / Music by Mathijs Wiermans

Please consider scrolling down to download one of the standalone versions, especially if you are experiencing framerate issues with the plugin above.

Flipget is a p. cool game (the 'p' is for planeats (planeats are neat planets)).

This was a neat voyage into Mario Galaxy-esque sticky surfaces. Unfortunately, 5.5 of my 7 days were spent on stuff you can't see, so I had to leave out a lot of cool platforming and obstacle avoidance. My physics is pretty precarious so I'm sure a lot of people are going to break my game. However, it's still p. cool if you ask me.

I was extremely fortunate to have Mathijs Wiermans (https://twitter.com/Mjattie) make me 3 whole tracks. I've never gotten music from anyone else, so that was refreshing, and a huge time saver. Not to mention the music was really good.

Anyways, I hope you all enjoi. Th4x 4 checkin the page. Cool!
